Floor
Class FloorManager

java.lang.Object
  Floor.FloorManager

public class FloorManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages the Floor and sets/gets the number of floors, and The class also initializes (int numFloors) and (int floorNumber)

Author:
Shabbir Vijapura/Harmeet Masuta

Field Summary

private static java.util.ArrayList<Floor> floors

Constructor Summary
private FloorManager()
          A private constructor that creates floor instances based on how many building stories there are and keeps them in an ArrayList.
